turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All chicken barbecue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 3 medium pizzas all chicken bbq, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make sure there's thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can add that to the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: picking up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
